LanguageData.Bulbfreak.label: bulbfreak
LanguageData.Bulbfreak.description: A horrid oozing amalgamation of many smaller fleshbeasts, all controlled by a linked nervous system. It has two large claws which it uses to tear through its victims. Bulbfreaks are often smelled before they are seen, giving off an overwhelming odor of rancid meat. They are relatively slow and easy to kill, but once they die, they explode into a horde of smaller fleshbeasts.
LanguageData.Bulbfreak.tools.tentacle-0.label: tentacle
LanguageData.Bulbfreak.tools.tentacle-1.label: tentacle
LanguageData.Bulbfreak.tools.tentacle-2.label: tentacle
LanguageData.Bulbfreak.tools.tentacle-3.label: tentacle
LanguageData.Bulbfreak.tools.tentacle-4.label: tentacle
LanguageData.Bulbfreak.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Dreadmeld.label: dreadmeld
LanguageData.Dreadmeld.description: A gargantuan amalgamation of dozens of smaller fleshbeasts linked together by a loosely shared central nervous system. It uses its massive claws to dig tunnels through solid rock. Fleshbeast dreadmelds are rarely seen above ground, instead sheltering in caverns built from living flesh. They share a psychic connection with the flesh used to create their burrow.
LanguageData.Dreadmeld.comps.CompLetterOnRevealed.tex: You've discovered a fleshbeast dreadmeld! This mammoth creature seems to be a made up of dozens of smaller fleshbeasts.\n\nIt appears to have some psychic connection to the fleshmass that supports this cavern. Killing it may destabilize the entire cave system.
LanguageData.Dreadmeld.tools.left_spike.label: left spike
LanguageData.Dreadmeld.tools.right_spike.label: right spike
LanguageData.Dreadmeld.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Fingerspike.label: fingerspike
LanguageData.Fingerspike.description: A fleshy dog-sized creature with a single spiked limb. Despite their short legs, fingerspikes can move remarkably fast.
LanguageData.Fingerspike.tools.spike.label: spike
LanguageData.Fingerspike.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Toughspike.label: toughspike
LanguageData.Toughspike.description: A fleshy man-sized creature with two spiked limbs and an armored carapace. Toughspikes throw hardened keratin spikes to take down victims from a distance.\n\nToughspike corpses will dissolve into puddles of liquefied flesh if they're not butchered quickly.
LanguageData.Toughspike.tools.left_spike.label: left spike
LanguageData.Toughspike.tools.right_spike.label: right spike
LanguageData.Toughspike.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Trispike.label: trispike
LanguageData.Trispike.description: A man-sized amalgamation of several smaller fleshbeasts. Each of the creature's limbs is capable of surviving independently. On death, trispikes may split into separate fingerspikes as each limb rips free and attacks.
LanguageData.Trispike.tools.left_spike.label: left spike
LanguageData.Trispike.tools.right_spike.label: right spike
LanguageData.Trispike.tools.top_spike.label: top spike
LanguageData.Trispike.tools.head.label: head
